expenses.title: Expense Tracking
expenses.description: Log and categorize all business expenses.
expenses.noExpenses: No expenses recorded yet. Add one to get started.
expenses.addDescription: Fill in the details for the new expense.
expenses.editDescription: Update the details for this expense.
expenses.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete this expense record. This action cannot be undone.
expenses.categoriesDescription: Add, edit, or delete expense categories.
expenses.categoryFormDescription: Provide a name for the category.
expenses.deleteCategoryConfirmDescriptio: This will remove the category. Existing expenses will need to be re-categorized. This action cannot be undone.
expenses.noCategories: No categories found. Please add one first.
